insert into contract (carrier, ac_type, create_time, update_time, contract_number, party_a, party_b, party_a_user, party_b_user, start_time, end_time, img ) values (#{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{acType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{contractNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyAUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{partyBUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update contract set carrier = #{carrier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ac_type = #{acType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, contract_number = #{contractNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_a = #{partyA,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_b = #{partyB,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_a_user = #{partyAUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, party_b_user = #{partyBUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, carrier, ac_type, create_time, update_time, contract_number, party_a, party_b, party_a_user, party_b_user, start_time, end_time, img from contract where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
